name: Herbed Lentil-Cabbage Soup
description: Good and healthful! Cabbage is an excellent source of potassium, vitamin K and fiber. Lentils are an excellent source of lean protein, fiber and vitamin B.

ingredients.name: shredded Savoy cabbage or other green cabbage

preparation: Heat a Multipurpose Pot over medium heat. Add oil and sauté onion for approximately 3 minutes, or until soft.
Add broth and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to medium-low; add cabbage and lentils. Stir and gently simmer for approximately 8 minutes, or until cabbage is tender-crisp.
Sprinkle with Fines Herbes and add Salt and Pepper. Stir well and serve.

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavor as making it from scratch—just add water!
